EagleBoolean EagleDbTuple_set ( EagleDbTuple *  tuple,
int  position,
EagleDbSqlValue *  value,
EagleDataType  columnType 
)

Set a tuple column with a dynamic value.

Parameters:
[in] tuple The tuple instance.
[in] position The column position, the first column will be index 0.
[in] value The value (of any type).
[in] columnType The type of the column in the tuple.
Returns:
EagleTrue if the value can be cast successfully and put into the tuple. Otherwise EagleFalse will be returned and the tuple will remain unmodified.
